skdetail:

Invocation Name: trivia rush
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Trivia Rush: The Ultimate Rapid-Fire Quiz Challenge** 🧠⏱️

Get ready for the ultimate test of your knowledge with Trivia Rush! This exhilarating Alexa skill challenges you to answer as many rapid-fire trivia questions as you can in just 60 seconds. Whether you're a whiz at science, a sports fanatic, or a geography guru, Trivia Rush will put your brainpower to the test.

HOW IT WORKS
60-Second Challenge: ⏰ You have one minute to answer as many questions as possible.
Earn Extra Time: ⏳ Each correct answer adds 10 extra seconds to keep you in the game longer.
Score Big: 🏅 Earn 50 points for every correct answer.
Combo Bonuses: 🎉 Get two correct answers in a row for a 50-point bonus, and a streak of three correct answers adds a whopping 100 points to your score.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS
Bonus Round: Unlock special rounds for even more excitement and higher stakes.
Leaderboard:🥇 Climb to the top of the Hall of Fame and see how you stack up against other players.
Time Boost: Gain extra time to keep your streak alive and maximize your score.
Daily Rewards:🎁 Enjoy daily bonuses and rewards to keep you coming back for more.

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Trivia Rush to play daily questions. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap "When this happens" to choose the trigger. For example, your can select Voice and then type "Trivia Rush"
5. Tap "Add action" and select "Skills"
6. Tap Your skills and find the "Trivia Rush" skill in the list
7. Tap "Save" in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

Are you ready to take on the Trivia Rush challenge? Sharpen your mind, beat the clock, and prove your trivia prowess. Try Trivia Rush now and see how high you can score!

SUPPORT/ FEEDBACK
Your reviews and feedback are important to us! We'd love to hear from you! You can email us at hello@voicegames.ai
